categorize.name: Categorize your data
categorize.description: Access a library full of workflows to help you categorize all kinds of data such as text, image and audio. So you can save time labelling and focus on the analysis that matters most to you.

generate.name: Generative AI
generate.description: Generate all kinds of new content off your data, from blogs, images, faqs to customer responses.

insight.name: Extract insights
insight.description: Expertly curated workflows that will automatically analyze and generate insightful charts, reports or dashboards on your data.

enrich.name: Enrich your data
enrich.description: Access a library full of workflows to enrich your data with all sorts of information such as sentiment, emotions, and more. Helping you find more insights out of your data.

clean.name: Clean your data
clean.description: Save time manually defining rules to clean up data with workflows such as anonymization, html removal and more.

integration.name: Integrations
integration.description: Import data from all kinds of different places such as social media, app store, conversations and more.

export.name: Export
export.description: Export your analysis back out to commonly used formats such as standard CSVs, wide-format CSVs and more.

text.name: Text
text.description: Access a library of state-of-the-art NLP (Natural Language Processing) workflows to help you maximize the utility of your text data. Includes popular workflows such as sentiment analysis, categorization, tagging and more.

audio.name: Audio
audio.description: Access a library of state-of-the-art NLP Audio processing workflows. Includes popular workflows such as AI transcriptions, conversation summarization, speaker diarization and more.

image.name: Image
image.description: Access a library of state-of-the-art CV (Computer Vision) workflows to help you extract all sorts of information from your image data. Includes popular workflows such as tagging, AI image modification and more.

video.name: Video
video.description: Workflows that help you take advantage of cutting-edge video analysis.

other.name: Other
other.description: Workflows that support data types other than text, audio, image and video. Such as PDFs, 3D objects and more.

general.name: General
general.description: Workflows that are applicable to all industries.

gaming,-media-&-entertainment.name: Gaming, Media & Entertainment
gaming,-media-&-entertainment.description: Workflows that are applicable to the gaming, media and entertainment industries.

retail-&-ecommerce.name: Retail & Ecommerce
retail-&-ecommerce.description: Workflows that are applicable to the retail and ecommerce industries.

financial-services.name: Financial Services
financial-services.description: Workflows that are applicable to the financial services industry.

technology.name: Technology
technology.description: Workflows that are applicable to the technology industry.

manufacturing.name: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Workflows that are applicable to the manufacturing industry.

healthcare.name: Healthcare
healthcare.description: Workflows that are applicable to the healthcare industry.

customer-experience.name: Customer Experience
customer-experience.description: Workflows that are applicable to the customer experience teams.

market-research.name: Market & User Research
market-research.description: Workflows that are applicable to the market research teams.

product-development.name: Product Development
product-development.description: Workflows that are applicable to the developers and product teams.

data.name: Data
data.description: Workflows that are applicable to the data and machine learning teams.

marketing.name: Marketing
marketing.description: Workflows that are applicable to the marketing teams.

sales.name: Sales
sales.description: Workflows that are applicable to the sales teams.

finance.name: Finance
finance.description: Workflows that are applicable to the finance teams.

design.name: Design
design.description: Workflows that are applicable to the design teams.

hr.name: HR
hr.description: Workflows that are applicable to the HR teams.

survey.name: Survey
survey.description: Workflows that help you analyze survey data.

feedback.name: Feedback
feedback.description: Workflows that help you analyze user feedback.

interview.name: Interview
interview.description: Workflows that help you analyze user interview and focus groups calls.

conversation.name: Conversation
conversation.description: Workflows that help you analyze conversations, such as customer service or sales calls.

help-desk.name: Help Desk
help-desk.description: Workflows that help you analyze help desk tickets or search through tickets better.

social-media.name: Social Media
social-media.description: Workflows that help you analyze social media data.

product-data.name: Product Data
product-data.description: Workflows that help you analyze product data.

seo.name: SEO
seo.description: Workflows that help you improve SEO.

machine-learning.name: Machine Learning
machine-learning.description: Workflows that help you improve machine learning models.

unstructured-data.name: Unstructured Data
unstructured-data.description: Workflows that help you extract and structure data from unstructured data.

chunking.name: Chunking
chunking.description: Workflows related to chunking - breaking up a long of data into smaller pieces. For example paragraphs to sentences.
